rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: "Preventing seasonal influenza in these workers, many of whom are also potentially exposed to H5N1 viruses may also reduce the risk of new versions of the influenza A virus emerging," Shah said at the news conference.
